languages.text: Перед судном Вольного Торговца несколько кораблей эльдарских разведчиков. Ксеносы не торопятся нападать, и время словно замедляется — одно неверное движение, и начнется бойня.

traits.locale_text: Перед вами несколько кораблей эльдарских разведчиков. Кненосы не торопятся нападать, но и пропускать вас так просто не намерены. Время словно замедляется — одно неверное движение, и начнется бойня.

languages.text: The Rogue Trader's voidship is facing several Aeldari scout ships. The xenos are in no hurry to attack, and time seems to have slowed down: one wrong move and carnage will ensue.
languages.original_text: Перед судном Вольного Торговца несколько кораблей эльдарских разведчиков. Ксеносы не торопятся нападать, и время словно замедляется — одно неверное движение, и начнется бойня.

traits.locale_text: You're facing several Aeldari scout ships. The xenos are in no hurry to attack, and time seems to have slowed down: one wrong movement and carnage may ensue.
You're facing several Aeldari scout ships. The xenos are in no hurry to attack, and time seems to have slowed down: one wrong movement and carnage may ensue.
You're facing several Aeldari scout ships. The xenos are in no hurry to attack, and time seems to have slowed down: one wrong movement and carnage may ensue.
You are facing several Aeldari scout ships. The xenos are in no hurry to attack, and time seems to have slowed down: one wrong move and carnage will ensue.
You are facing several Aeldari scout ships. The xenos are in no hurry to attack, and time seems to have slowed down: one wrong move and carnage will ensue.
The Rogue Trader's voidship is facing several Aeldari scout ships. The xenos are in no hurry to attack, and time seems to have slowed down: one wrong move and carnage will ensue.

languages.text: 几艘艾达灵族的侦查艇来到了行商浪人的旗舰前。那些异形似乎并不急于发动攻击，时间似乎都变慢了。一旦有人做出了错误的举动，恐怕就会血流成河。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's voidship is facing several Aeldari scout ships. The xenos are in no hurry to attack, and time seems to have slowed down: one wrong move and carnage will ensue.

traits.locale_text: 几艘艾达灵族的侦查艇来到了行商浪人的旗舰前。那些异形似乎并不急于发动攻击，时间似乎都变慢了。一旦有人做出了错误的举动，恐怕就会血流成河。
几艘艾达灵族的侦查艇来到了你面前。那些异形似乎并不急于发动攻击，时间似乎都变慢了。一旦你做出了错误的举动，恐怕就会血流成河。

languages.text: La nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente se enfrenta a varias naves de exploración Aeldari. Los xenos no parecen tener prisa por atacar. Es como si el tiempo se hubiera detenido: un paso en falso y comenzará la matanza.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's voidship is facing several Aeldari scout ships. The xenos are in no hurry to attack, and time seems to have slowed down: one wrong move and carnage will ensue.

traits.locale_text: La nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente se enfrenta a varias naves de exploración Aeldari. Los xenos no parecen tener prisa por atacar. Es como si el tiempo se hubiera detenido: un paso en falso y comenzará la matanza.

languages.text: 数隻のアエルダリの調査船と対峙している。異種族は攻撃を急がず、時間がゆっくり流れているようだ。一歩間違えれば大惨事になる。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's voidship is facing several Aeldari scout ships. The xenos are in no hurry to attack, and time seems to have slowed down: one wrong move and carnage will ensue.

traits.locale_text: 数隻のアエルダリの調査船と対峙している。異種族（ゼノ）は攻撃を急がず、時間がゆっくり流れているようだ。一歩間違えれば大惨事になる。
数隻のアエルダリの調査船と対峙している。異種族（ゼノ）は攻撃を急がず、時間がゆっくり流れているようだ。一歩間違えれば大惨事になる。

languages.text: Dem Raumschiff {mf|des Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} stehen mehreren Erkundungsschiffen der Aeldari gegenüber. Die Xenos machen keine Anstalten anzugreifen, und die Zeit scheint sich verlangsamt zu haben: Ein falscher Schritt und es kommt zu einem Blutbad.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's voidship is facing several Aeldari scout ships. The xenos are in no hurry to attack, and time seems to have slowed down: one wrong move and carnage will ensue.

traits.locale_text: Dem Raumschiff {mf|des Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} stehen mehreren Erkundungsschiffen der Aeldari gegenüber. Die Xenos machen keine Anstalten anzugreifen, und die Zeit scheint sich verlangsamt zu haben: Ein falscher Schritt und es kommt zu einem Blutbad.

Du stehst mehreren Erkundungsschiffen der Aeldari gegenüber. Die Xenos machen keine Anstalten anzugreifen, und die Zeit scheint sich verlangsamt zu haben: Ein falscher Schritt und es kommt zu einem Blutbad.

languages.text: Le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre marchande} fait face à plusieurs navires de reconnaissance aeldaris. Les xénos ne sont pas pressés d'attaquer et le temps semble avoir ralenti : une seule erreur suffira à provoquer un carnage.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's voidship is facing several Aeldari scout ships. The xenos are in no hurry to attack, and time seems to have slowed down: one wrong move and carnage will ensue.

traits.locale_text: Le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre marchande} fait face à plusieurs navires de reconnaissance aeldaris. Les xénos ne sont pas pressés d'attaquer et le temps semble avoir ralenti : une seule erreur suffira à provoquer un carnage.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in uçsuz gemisinin karşısına birçok Aeldari keşif gemisi çıkıyor. Zenolar, saldırıya geçmek için acele etmiyorlar. Zamansa âdeta yavaşlamış gibi geliyor. Tek bir yanlış hareketin kıyıma yol açacağı aşikâr.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's voidship is facing several Aeldari scout ships. The xenos are in no hurry to attack, and time seems to have slowed down: one wrong move and carnage will ensue.
